Posts.Content: It's gone!! They took it out yesterday. I'm sore but I feel awesome! One more step forward!
Posts.Title: My port

Posts.Content: It's been four months since I finished my chemo and my hair is a bout 1/2 in long. I don't care if it's purple! I'm just thrilled to HAVE hair! But I'm also 62, so salt and pepper is the spice of my life these days. Hmm, hadn't thought about purple. Sounds interesting...... My husband would PAY me to stop thinking! ;-)
Posts.Title: It's the Hair
